```{r, include = FALSE}
# Collection of resources
# Resources are rendered in a 3 columns grid.
# Text description should be one sentence

library(mlr3misc)
library(htmltools)
library(data.table)

resource_grid = function(content) {
  div(class = "grid-container-package",
    pmap(content, function(name, icon, url, text) {
        div(class = "grid-item-package",
          h3(
            a(href = url, name),
            tags$i(class = sprintf("bi-%s", icon))
          ),
          text
        )
    })
  )
}
```

## General

```{r, echo = FALSE}
content = rbindlist(list(
  list(name = "Book", icon = "book", url = "https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com/", text = "Central entry point to the mlr3verse."),
  list(name = "Gallery", icon = "image", url = "https://mlr3gallery.mlr-org.com/", text = "The gallery has some case studies and demonstrates how frequently occurring problems can be solved.")
))

resource_grid(content)
```
